trans-unit.source: Container for all dialog-editing logic for <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.PropertyEntry*> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contenitore di tutta la logica per la finestra di dialogo Modifica <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.PropertyEntry*>oggetti.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.PropertyEntry*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DialogPropertyValueEditor class to show an inline editor that can have an associated dialog box editor.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe DialogPropertyValueEditor per visualizzare un inline editor che può avere un editor finestra di dialogo associato.

trans-unit.source: The DialogPropertyValueEditor class can hold either a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for a dialog box editor or custom logic that is called when the dialog box is invoked.
trans-unit.target: La classe DialogPropertyValueEditor può contenere un <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>per una finestra di dialogo o di una logica personalizzata che viene chiamata quando viene richiamata la finestra di dialogo.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> in your <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to invoke your custom DialogPropertyValueEditor class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare lo <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>richiamare classe DialogPropertyValueEditor personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton>

trans-unit.source: You can provide a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> which is shown in a host dialog box, or you can override the <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> method, which enables the reuse of existing or system dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: È possibile fornire un <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>mostrato in una finestra di dialogo host oppure è possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>(metodo), che consente il riutilizzo delle finestre di dialogo esistenti o di sistema.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the rules for determining whether the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> or <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> method is used.
trans-unit.target: Nell'elenco seguente vengono illustrate le regole per determinare se il <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>o <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>viene usato il metodo.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A> property is not a [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> is hosted in a host-specific dialog box, which provides host styling.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>proprietà non è un [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] riferimento (Nothing in Visual Basic), che <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>è ospitato in una finestra di dialogo specifica dell'host che fornisce l'host applicazione degli stili.</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>non viene chiamato.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A> property is a [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the virtual <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> method is called and you can override this method to show any dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>proprietà è un [!INCLUDE[null](~/add/includes/null-md.md)] riferimento (Nothing in Visual Basic), virtuale <xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog>metodo viene chiamato ed è possibile eseguire l'override di questo metodo per visualizzare qualsiasi finestra di dialogo.</xref:Systems.Windows.Forms.ShowDialog> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor"></xref> class with no specific templates.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor"> </xref> classe senza modelli specifici.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor> class with the specified dialog editor and inline editor templates.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor>classe con l'editor della finestra di dialogo specificata e i modelli di editor inline.</xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Window.DataTemplate> that is hosted in a host-specific dialog chrome and has its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> set to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> that corresponds to the property being edited.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Window.DataTemplate>che è ospitato in un riquadro della finestra di dialogo specifica dell'host e si dispone di relativo <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*>impostato sul <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> che corrisponde alla proprietà da modificare.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> </xref:System.Window.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used for the inline editor user interface.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> che viene utilizzato per l'interfaccia utente dell'editor inline.

trans-unit.source: If used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> is set to the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> that corresponds to the property being edited.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizzato, il relativo <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*>è impostato sul <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> che corrisponde alla proprietà da modificare.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is hosted by a host-specific dialog and has its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext*> set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> che è ospitato da una finestra di dialogo specifica dell'host e dispone il <> </> *> impostato su un <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If this property returns `null`, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.ShowDialog%2A> method is called instead.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà restituisce `null`, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.ShowDialog%2A>viene invece chiamato il metodo.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> object that is hosted by a host-specific dialog.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> oggetto che è ospitato da una finestra di dialogo specifica dell'host.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate*> is null and a dialog has been invoked by the user.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate*>è null e una finestra di dialogo è stato richiamato dall'utente.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DialogPropertyValueEditor.DialogEditorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Since the commands get handled by the host and since custom dialogs are not going to be part of that visual tree, the `commandSource` exposes an <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> that is part of the host's visual tree and that, therefore, can be used to execute property editing commands in such a way that they are handled correctly.
trans-unit.target: Poiché i comandi vengono gestiti dall'host e finestre di dialogo personalizzate non faranno parte di tale struttura ad albero visuale di `commandSource` espone un <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>che fa parte della struttura ad albero visuale dell'host e che, pertanto, può essere utilizzato per eseguire i comandi in modo che vengano gestiti correttamente di modifica delle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method enables you to implement any custom dialog logic, such as invoking existing system dialogs.
trans-unit.target: Override di questo metodo consente di implementare la logica di qualsiasi finestra di dialogo personalizzata, ad esempio richiamando le finestre di dialogo di sistema esistente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*> for the property being edited.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*>per la proprietà da modificare.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyValue*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.IinputElement> that can be used as a source for execution of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditorCommands"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.IinputElement>che può essere utilizzato come origine per l'esecuzione di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditorCommands"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.IinputElement>
